attributes.action: look at the  intention of immigration and border controll to return a boy  to Afghanistan whe was stoneded by neighbours and beaten by  police because he had converted to christianity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the light of COI report for Afghanistan dated 26th of June 2009 para  19.24 , 19.27 , 19.29 how can they deem it to be safe to return 
this boy to a country where he is illiterate in the language and there
is no evidence in scripture or tradition about being a Christian in secret. It is about community being part of a body a family and we think that this misconception of the christian faith will put people in danger and at risk 
 Zaman Mohammadi is an Afghani boy whos parents dissappeared  when he was about 13 he was coverted to Christianity through  listening to Christian radio. Was Baptised by Western Christian  Aid Workers sufferd stoning by his neighbours and the threat of  death by the police. He is a regular worship and practicing  memeber of Saint Luke's Wallsend. The only language he can 
read and write is English and to return him to Afghanistan at this time could put his life in danger. It has already caused him great mental anguish for which he is receiving medical help
